summary: REFERENCE TO EXISTING RECALL 20V398000  OUR FURRION WING STYLE ANTENNA HAS SEPARATED IN THE SAME MANNER AS DESCRIBED IN THE ABOVE NOTED RECALL.  AFTER ARRIVING HOME FROM A TRIP WE NOTICED THAT THE "WING" PART OF THE ANTENNA HAD SEPARATED FROM THE BASE AND PULLED OUT TWO COAX WIRES, DAMAGING BOTH.  THIS SEPARATION OCCURRED DURING THE DRIVE HOME.  MY WIFE HEARD A SOUND DURING THE DRIVE ON HIGHWAY 36, BUT WE DID NOT IDENTIF WHAT OCCURRED UNTIL OUR ARRIVAL HOME.  KEYSTONE HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE ISSUE.
